extendedInfo.description: Bugbox puts JIRA in your pocket. Helps you stay on top of issues even when offline!Background updates, notifications, intuitive interface - all together provide a seamless experience.Requires SOAP plugin. Feel free to email us for help!JIRA is a trademark of Atlassian. Bugbox is not affiliated in any way with them.https://picasaweb.google.com/getbugbox/BugboxForJIRAAndroid#

reviews.title: Too limited
reviews.comment: The app limits all functionality to the point of being impossible to test, and what does work, takes too long to load... no way I\'ll be dropping that much for the full version to continue testing... better would be an unlimited trial for a period of time... uninstalling
reviews.author: Raymond Chandler

reviews.title: Don\'t Bother
reviews.comment: The LITE version is too limited to be useful, and the full version is too expensive.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice app
reviews.comment: Looks interesting. Currently working so far
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Um. 5min lifespan?
reviews.comment: Was trying to get a feel for it. After about 5 mins, the app silently stopped saving issues and searching. Looks decent enough but saving issues has no confirmation and some of the issues didn\'t make it... I fully expect the full app to do the same. Not worth the money.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: application unusable
reviews.comment: I was trying to connect with jboss\' s jira but doesn\'t work !  The price for the full version is too expensive.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: \'Lite\' version hobbled
reviews.comment: ... to the point of being useless after a period of time. Too bad... Uninstalling...  Hello, Mobile Jira! :)
reviews.author: kuni katsuya

reviews.title: Ok, but to limited
reviews.comment: Inconvenient in some places, but generally ok to use. Not good on slow connection. Not worth money for me.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Limited
reviews.comment: Can\'t do much in the app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good user experience
reviews.comment: Been using this for an hour on HTC Sensation. Works great.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Can\'t connect
reviews.comment: ... to Jira Studio with Google auth. Would be nice if connection setup was more tailored and provided informative feedback or suggestions.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No ics support
reviews.comment: It was working great on nexus s. But it doesn\'t work on galaxy nexus. It doesn\'t even open
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Can\'t even connect to my Jira server, while the open source OpenJira app is fine!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Could be good
reviews.comment: If you want Jira for Android, this is your only bet. It *does* work with hosted Jira. Unfortunately as others have commented it has some major flaws: the developer is slow to respond (last update over 4 months ago?!), the lite version is so crippled that it\'s impossible to evaluate and the price is sky high ($25).
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Would be nice if the demo actually... You know... Was a demo. Features disable after using them once or twice without you getting a decent feel for it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Gave 4 stars because it only supports one Horace server, besides that it is awesome.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Create issue screen loses data entered if the network connection drops.
reviews.author: A Google User
